text: The women's tournament of basketball at the 2015 Summer Universiade in Gwangju began on July 5 and end on July 13. ==Teams== {|class=wikitable width=100% |- !width=16%|Africa !width=16%|Americas !width=16%|Asia !width=16%|Europe !width=16%|Oceania |- valign=top | | | | | |} ==Preliminary round== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left;" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the Final eight |- |width=10px bgcolor=#afeeee| ||Qualified for the Placement 9th–16th |} ===Group A=== |} ===Group B=== |} ===Group C=== |} ===Group D=== |} ==Classification round== ===Quarter-final round=== ====9th–16th place==== ===Semi-final round=== ====13th–16th place==== ====9th–12th place==== ====5th–8th place==== ===Final round=== ====15th place game==== ====13th place game==== ====11th place game==== ====9th place game==== ====7th place game==== ====5th place game==== ==Elimination round== ===Quarter-finals=== ===Semi-finals=== ===Bronze Medal Game=== ===Gold Medal Game=== ==Final standings== Team accepting gold medal at the 2015 World University Games in South Korea {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! width=30|Place !! width=175|Team !! width=50|Score |- | ||align="left"| || |- | ||align="left"| || |- | ||align="left"| || |- | 4 ||align="left"| || |- | 5 ||align="left"| || |- | 6 ||align="left"| || |- | 7 ||align="left"| || |- | 8 ||align="left"| || |- | 9 ||align="left"| || |- | 10 ||align="left"| || |- | 11 ||align="left"| || |- | 12 ||align="left"| || |- | 13 ||align="left"| || |- | 14 ||align="left"| || |- | 15 ||align="left"| || |- | 16 ||align="left"| || |} ==References== 2015 Basketball – Women's Category:2015 in women's basketball Women's Category:International women's basketball competitions hosted by South Korea Category:2015 in South Korean women's sport
